title: Imagine the struggle...
body:
https://i.imgur.com/oGATAaA.png
If this thing happened to me as of today, i'll either have to wait a whole day or rush like crazy to level up to get that one tiny blue essence for buying a 6300 champ that I'd really want. I imagine the struggle the new players must go through today to buy the expensive champs who looks interesting to them. Like, they either want to get really really lucky in the level-up boxes or keep themselves from buying any other cheaper champions just to have this occasion. And now, if this happens, they'll have to either wait or rush to get what they want, their excitation of buying THE champion they wanted quickly murdered by this crappy system. This is not fun at all, this system is a direct downgrade, a frustrating concept and, most of all, less rewarding than before, like it has been proved several times by other players

replies.body: You can get some for free if you give Rito a LoL-related drawing.
are they doing it for be i thought that was only for rp because rp cost real money
If we take the same example mentioning new players, I don't think that those who just joined the community would know about this functionality
Maybe, maybe not. It's not uncommon that new players to a game visits its boards. Eventually they will found out about this. Or not.
I don't see waiting one day for a champion unlock to be some massively painful ordeal.

compaired to the fact that you could've just spend 10 minutes in a rushed Bot game to have the same result before, yeah. For persons who can play only the week-end(who are quite common), its just frustrating if you have to wait an entire week just because its too hard for a company to improve their progression system instead of downgrading it

You're upset because during a week when you couldn't play League you didn't have a champion unlocked for all the games you weren't playing?
Why?
That is your mistake. you should never buy the champion for the full 6300 value.... you should wait 1 year for the magic capsule to drop the shard for the discount!!! thank you Riot generous.

You dont need to play the game more than a month to have the mechanical skill to play any champ. 
This new system is dumb recently had 100 too low to get a champ i wanted. Instead of playing 2 games for it i had to wait two days. Fun.
I have all this BE and i have no idea on what to buy... 235K any ideas???

Blue essence only drops in amounts of 10 now so a new player would never reach any other number than 0 at the end, unless they change something in how you get it every time you get blue essence now should be in amounts of 10s so if you like that person and myself have a 9 at the end you will be stuck with it.
